markdown.markdown: Market intelligence transforms raw agricultural data into actionable insights. By combining AI, mobile platforms, and predictive analytics, we help farmers, cooperatives, and SACCOs in Western Kenya understand pricing trends, buyer demand, and trade opportunities‚Äîlocally and regionally. --- ## Core Features ### Real-Time Price Tracking - Monitor commodity prices across major markets (Eldoret, Kisumu, Nairobi). - Compare farm-gate vs. wholesale vs. retail prices. - Alert farmers when prices hit profitable thresholds. ### Demand Forecasting - Use historical sales and weather data to predict demand for maize, beans, bananas, and sugarcane. - Guide planting decisions based on projected market gaps. - Help cooperatives plan aggregation and storage. ### Logistics Optimization - Recommend transport routes based on road conditions and market timing. - Reduce post-harvest losses with smart dispatch planning. - Integrate with SACCO-owned vehicles and aggregation centers. --- ## üåæ Crop-Specific Insights ### Maize - Track miller demand and seasonal price spikes. - Identify surplus zones and link to deficit counties. ### Beans & Pulses - Forecast urban demand during school terms and festive seasons. - Recommend inter-county trade routes. ### Bananas & Horticulture - Monitor perishability windows and cold chain needs. - Match supply with urban retailers and export buyers. ### Sugarcane - Analyze factory intake schedules and cane maturity zones. - Support contract farming with price transparency. --- ## üîó Market Data Sources ### [KAMIS ‚Äì Kenya Agricultural Market Information System](https://kamis.kilimo.go.ke/site/market) - Daily wholesale and retail prices for key crops - Market-specific data from across Kenya ### [KOMEX ‚Äì Kenya Commodity Exchange Analytics](https://analytics.komex.co.ke/) - Price trends, volumes, and trade recommendations - Covers maize, beans, rice, wheat, and pulses --- ## ü§ù Strategic Partnerships ### Kenya National Bureau of Statistics (KNBS) - Integrate market data feeds for price validation and policy support. ### County Governments - Co-develop dashboards for trade planning and subsidy targeting. ### Farmer Cooperatives & SACCOs - Share insights via WhatsApp, SMS, and dashboards. - Train members to interpret trends and negotiate better deals. --- [Contact us](mailto:info@lighthouseanalytics.ke)

By combining AI, mobile platforms, and predictive analytics, we help farmers, cooperatives, and SACCOs in Western Kenya understand pricing trends, buyer demand, and trade opportunities‚Äîlocally and regionally. --- ## Core Features ### Real-Time Price Tracking - Monitor commodity prices across major markets (Eldoret, Kisumu, Nairobi). - Compare farm-gate vs. wholesale vs. retail prices. - Alert farmers when prices hit profitable thresholds. ### Demand Forecasting - Use historical sales and weather data to predict demand for maize, beans, bananas, and sugarcane. - Guide planting decisions based on projected market gaps. - Help cooperatives plan aggregation and storage. ### Logistics Optimization - Recommend transport routes based on road conditions and market timing. - Reduce post-harvest losses with smart dispatch planning. - Integrate with SACCO-owned vehicles and aggregation centers. --- ## üåæ Crop-Specific Insights ### Maize - Track miller demand and seasonal price spikes. - Identify surplus zones and link to deficit counties. ### Beans & Pulses - Forecast urban demand during school terms and festive seasons. - Recommend inter-county trade routes. ### Bananas & Horticulture - Monitor perishability windows and cold chain needs. - Match supply with urban retailers and export buyers. ### Sugarcane - Analyze factory intake schedules and cane maturity zones. - Support contract farming with price transparency. --- ## üîó Market Data Sources ### [KAMIS ‚Äì Kenya Agricultural Market Information System](https://kamis.kilimo.go.ke/site/market) -
